$Menu.confirm-clear-all-data: Are you sure you want to clear all the data?
$Menu.confirm-import-db: Are you sure you want to import a database? It will override any current information.
$Menu.confirm-migrate-to-flexible:
Are you sure you want to migrate the fixed calendar database to the flexible calendar?

The existing flexible calendar database will be cleared.
$Menu.migrate-calendar-to-flexible: Migrate fixed calendar database to flexible
$Menu.should-migrate-to-flexible: Your flexible calendar is empty. Do you want to start by migrating the existing fixed calendar database to your flexible one?
